UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The molecular characterization, expression analysis and antimicrobial activity of theromacin from Asian polychaeta (Perinereis linea)
Literature.Author: Joo M-S, Choi K-M, Cho D-H, Choi H-S, Min EY, Han H-J, Cho MY, Bae J-S, Park C-I

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli JM109(MIC=31.3µg/ml),Edwardsiella piscicida ET883(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Streptococcus iniae FP5228(MIC=31.3µg/ml),Vibrio alginolyticus KCCM 2928(MIC=15.6µg/ml),Vibrio campbellii KCCM 40684(MIC=7.8µg/ml),Vibrio harveyi ATCC 14126(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Vibrio ordalii KCCM 41669(MIC=1µg/ml)
